channel.title: [PI] Code to give Char donar after donating
channel.description:
Ive followed TUTS on how to set up auto donating and have all that worked out, now what Im trying to find/figure out is a snippet that would give the user donar status after they pay for it
What I have is [code]
if(prod == 1 && price == 10){ c.getItems().addItem(995,50000000); [/code] The product id is 1 and it costs $10 for donar status and 50m. I don't know how to make it change the CHAR file to donator = 1.
Any help would be amazingly appreciated!
